messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Kids Discover Magazine (was Magazines for  kids)
messages.msgSnippet: Olivia, Thanks for taking the time to send this info, I m going to look into it since several people mentioned it. Ann
messages.messageBody:
Olivia,
Thanks for taking the time to send this info, I'm going to look into it
since several people mentioned it.
Ann

Olivia wrote:

> > Date: Tue, 02 May 2000 01:09:53 -0400
> > From: "A. Yates" <hooperck@...>
> >Subject: Re: Re: Magazines for kids
> >
> >Can anyone out there give me the 800 number, or web site for Kids
> >Discover Magazine?
> >Thanks,
> >Ann
>
>
> Hi Ann:
>
> The latest issue of Kids Discover just came yesterday. I couldn't find
> a
> website for it so far; none is listed in the magazine. There is only a
>
> non-toll free phone number. Everything provided on the back cover is
> listed
> below.
>
>
> Kids Discover (published monthly, 10 issues a year)
> 149 Fifth Avenue
> New York, NY 10010
> (212) 677-4457
>
> Send subscriptions to:
> Kids Discover
> P.O. Box 54205
> Boulder, CO 80328-4205
>
> There is a card in the magazine for a one year, 10-issue subscription
> for
> $19.95. The regular price is $26.95 per year. I also saw some magazine
>
> services online that have it for $19.95, but I have never purchased
> anything from them. Also, there are no advertisements in the magazine,
>
> which is unusual and very nice!
>
> Olivia
>
> -----------------------------------------------------------------------
>
> -----------------------------------------------------------------------
> Message boards, timely articles, a free newsletter and more!
> Check it all out at: http://www.unschooling.com
>

>
